message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $800000. I'm looking forward to your response.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $950000. This is a fair compromise considering its value to you is $800000. I'm open to further negotiations if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $925000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm not willing to go as low as $925000. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get closer to my original offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $975000. This is the best I can do, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $975000. I'm willing to meet you at $955000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $955000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my original offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $990000. This is the best I can do, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price of $990000. I'm willing to meet you at $980000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $980000. I've already compromised significantly, and I need to get closer to my original offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $995000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.
